question: The first speaker of the Andhra Pradesh State Legislative Assembly that was formed on 1st Nov 1956:
explanation:
For Andhra state from 1953 to 1956, two members were acted as speakers. They were Nallapati Venkata Ramaih choudary from Guntur district and Lakshminarasimham Dora from Srikakulam.
Ayyadevara Kaleswara Rao was theÂ first speaker of the Andhra Pradesh State Legislative Assembly that was formed on 1st Nov 1956
